title: Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument: Cacti / Desert Succulents
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Cacti / Desert Succulents                Cacti / Desert Succulents         Ripe red fruit of the prickly pear cactus. NPS Photo by Barry Nielsen  Cactus common to the area include: Prickly Pear, Fendler's Hedgehog, Claret Cup Hedgehog, Cane Cholla.  Succulents include: Soaptree Yucca, Banana Yucca, Parry Agave, Desert Spoon.
